instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: I am working on a MacBook Pro that had a corrupt BIOS. I was lucky enough to find a dump in the EFI Repository. I flashed the ROM onto the BIOS chip and the computer boots however it is exhibiting signs of a bad ME region. Since I do not have access to the OS of the computer I do not know how to find out which ME version is needed. Is there any way to find the ME version based on EMC, specs, etc?

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: You upload the original dump here to be fixed! Don't tell me you didn't save it first....

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: It has been saved :) it is not allowing me to attach the .bin file to my post can I email it to you?

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: Here is the link for the EFI file :) [url]https://www.4shared.com/file/bfPxKg2vei/A1502_Bad_ME_Region_SN.html[/url]

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: What is the serial number of the machine? What is the problem with this original BIOS?

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: The problem with the  bios was the original had a ton of corrosion around the bios chip and it was burnt out.  The serial number is C02LRUG1FH00

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: Corrosion around the chip should not affect the contents. The serial number is correct in the file you uploaded. What does the machine do when you use this BIOS?

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: The computer fails to load recovery will not load single user mode also a lot of the time wont load the os.

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message: Any Ideas? I'm trying to get this repair done for a client and cant seem to figure out what is happening, will not load the os, recovery, or net work boot, also cpu heats up a good amount.

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message:
See if this solves the boot issue. If it does then I will merge the clean ME with your original BIOS.

[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByfhQ_x0v-tZamF3R0x1N0k0dDA/view?usp=sharing[/url]

threads.title: 820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
820-3476 corrupt efi replaced i need the correct m.e space
threads.message:
